definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)

sentences.english: EarthSound's products have an excellent track record in the States.

sentences.english: We enter the temple of the God of wealth will feel the feeling of beautiful decoration.

sentences.english: Heartiest congratulations on your splendid victory.

sentences.english: Seen from a slight distance, that would make a splendid spectacle.

sentences.english: He created the Persian Empire, one of the most splendid the world has ever seen.

sentences.english: And Hong Kong has seen some notable triumphs over the past decade.

sentences.english: Would it be possible to rebuild and perhaps restore Cybertron to its former glory?
sentences.chinese: 塞伯坦能夠得以重建，復興昔日的輝煌嗎？

sentences.english: The city was ablaze with light, and not a single air-raid alarm sounded .
sentences.chinese: 市內燈火輝煌，聽不到一聲空襲警報。

sentences.english: The modern metrical poetry together with the free verse achieved the great brilliance in one-hundred-year Chinese poetry.
sentences.chinese: 現代格律詩與自由詩共同創造了百年現代漢詩的輝煌。
